summary: PROBLEMS WITH WINDOW REGULATOR DESIGN.   3/30/2005  33,212 MILES, DRIVER'S SIDE WINDOW SHUDDERS AND STOPPED WORKING, WOULD NOT OPEN. WINDOW REPLACED UNDER WARRANTY.  3/13/2007 65,600 MILES, RT FRONT PASSENGER WINDOW, WOULD NOT OPEN, REQUIRED REPLACEMENT, COST TO REPAIR $500  8/20/2007 DRIVERS WINDOW AGAIN BARELY WORKING, AND WILL NEED REPLACEMENT FOR $500.  OBVIOUSLY A FLAW IF DESIGN OF WINDOW REGULATORS.  POSING DANGER IF CAN NOT OPEN WINDOW. *TR
